title: Minister Lamamra receives US Assistant Secretary of State for International Organization Affairs
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, received on Saturday US Assistant Secretary of State for International Organization Affairs, Ms. Michele Sison, who is on a working visit to Algeria.
The discussions focused on bilateral relations and prospects to strengthen the strategic dialogue and the economic cooperation between Algeria and the United States of America.
The two parties also exchanged on a number of issues related to regional and international issues as well as on various aspects of multilateral diplomacy.
